body_html:
I'm curious why lib/github/user.rb:19 does not return a valid URL that always returns the current avatar. Apparently the URL changes when an upload is made. Maybe there is non-changing URL in the returned datastructure or there is an update for omniauth.

If not, I'd vote for the "Update avatar from GH" and not having custom uploads.

body:
I'm curious why [`lib/github/user.rb:19`](https://github.com/rails-girls-summer-of-code/rgsoc-teams/blob/master/lib/github/user.rb#L19) does not return a valid URL that always returns the current avatar. Apparently the URL changes when an upload is made. Maybe there is non-changing URL in the returned datastructure or there is an update for omniauth.

If not, I'd vote for the "Update avatar from GH" and not having custom uploads.
